SELECT A.movie_idx AS movieIdx , B.screen_idx AS screenIdx , B.timetable_idx AS timetableIdx , A.movie_name_hngl AS movieNameHngl , A.movie_rate AS movieRate , A.running_time AS runningTime , D.screen_number AS screenNumber , D.floor AS floor , B.dimension_gb AS dimensionGb , B.start_time AS startTime , B.finish_time AS finishTime , D.seat_total - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEAT_RESERVE C WHERE C.timetable_idx = B.timetable_idx) AS total , C.file_top_path AS fileTopPath FROM MOVIES A , TIMETABLE B , (SELECT * FROM FILE WHERE table_gb = #{fileDTO2.tableGb} AND file_top_path IS NOT NULL ) C , SCREEN D WHERE A.movie_idx = B.movie_idx AND A.movie_idx = C.table_idx AND B.screen_idx = D.screen_idx AND B.screening_dt = #{wildCard}
AND A.movie_idx = #{movieIdx}

select a.*, IF(b.seat_reserve_idx is null,false,true) as seat_reserve_chk, SUBSTR(a.seat_number,1,1) as seat_row_title, SUBSTR(a.seat_number,2) as seat_row_num from (select * FROM SEAT where screen_idx = #{screenIdx}) a left outer join SEAT_RESERVE b on b.seat_number = a.seat_number and b.timetable_idx = #{timetableIdx};
